verses.name: Proverbs 18:13
verses.text: He that answereth a matter before he heareth it, it is folly and shame unto him.

verses.name: Proverbs 18:14
verses.text: The spirit of a man will sustain his infirmity; but a wounded spirit who can bear?

verses.name: Proverbs 18:15
verses.text: The heart of the prudent getteth knowledge; and the ear of the wise seeketh knowledge.

verses.name: Proverbs 18:16
verses.text: A man’s gift maketh room for him, and bringeth him before great men.

verses.name: Proverbs 18:17
verses.text: He that is first in his own cause seemeth just; but his neighbour cometh and searcheth him.

verses.name: Proverbs 18:18
verses.text: The lot causeth contentions to cease, and parteth between the mighty.
